Sentence: So will I save you, and you will be a blessing.
He is your praise; he is your God, who performed for you those great  and awesome wonders you saw with your own eyes.
Those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength.
And our hope for you is firm, because we know that just as you share in our sufferings, so also you share in our comfort.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
We know that anyone born of God does not continue to sin; the one who was born of God keeps him safe, and the evil one does not touch him.
Gladness and joy will overtake them, and sorrow and sighing will flee away.
Because the Sovereign LORD helps me; I will not be disgraced. Therefore, have I set my face like flint, and I know I will not be put to shame.
If you repent, I will restore you that you may serve.
I will watch over them to build and to plant", declares the Lord.
Anyone who has faith in me will do what I have been doing. He will do even greater things than these, because I am going to the Father.
Whoever hears my word and believes him who sent me has eternal life and will not be condemned; he has crossed over from death to life.
You know with all your heart and soul that not one of all the good promises the Lord your God gave you has failed. Every promise has been fulfilled; not one has failed.
If you believe, you will receive whatever you ask for in prayer.
Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called sons of God.
The joy of the Lord is your strength.

As far as the east is from the west, so far has he removed our transgressions from us. As a father has compassion on his children, so the Lord has compassion on those who fear him; for he knows how we are formed, he remembers that we are dust.
The Lord remembers us and will bless us.
Weeping may remain for a night, but rejoicing comes in the morning.
You guide me with your counsel, and afterward you will take me into glory.
For you did not receive a spirit that makes you a slave again to fear, but you received the Spirit of sonship
Ask, and it will be given to you: seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask for in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it is yours.

The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He will not grow tired or weary, and his understanding no one can fathom. He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
Reach out and you will touch Me, for I am not far from you.
I will soon crush the evil one under your feet.
You are My children now and you will be just like Jesus when He appears.
Jesus is happy to share His inheritance with you.
My plan for your future is filled with hope.
I will never abandon you.
My mercy will overrule judgment.
I began the good work in you and I will finish it.
When you walk through the fires of adversity, you will not be burned.
I sent the Spirit of My Son into your heart so you could call Me Father.
I prepared a kingdom inheritance for you when I created the world.
Just ask and you will receive.
All your days are known to Me and your inheritance is secure forever.
I am at work in your life through the desires of your heart.
The good things that I have planned for you are too many to count.
I will root your heart in the depths of My love.
Hold fast to the hope you confess, for I am faithful to keep My promises.
I will make you fruitful in your old age.
Do not be sad, for My joy is your strength.
All My blessings will overtake those who obey Me.
My love will never fail you.
I am giving you a kingdom that can never be shaken.
I will go before you and fight your battles.
When I offered up My one and only Son, I gave you the best gift I could give.
“Pray, hope, and don’t worry.”
“The reason for our existence is to quench the thirst of Jesus. When he asked for water, the soldier gave him vinegar to drink—but his thirst was for love, for souls, for you and me.”
“God will give eternal life to those who convert sinners and bring them to the right path.”
“Our goal must be infinite, not the finite. The infinite is our homeland. Heaven has been waiting for us forever.”
“In God’s will, there is great peace.”
“Even if I must suffer greatly, thanks be to God’s mercy, I will not lack courage.”
“We become what we love and who we love shapes what we become.”
“How easy it is to die with Jesus on the cross—if one has lived with Jesus on the cross!”

Source: Maria de las Maravillas de Jesús
Sentence: “Whatever God wants, as God wills, when God wills.”
“Faith lifts the soul. Hope supports it. Experience says it must. And Love says let it be!”
“Even if I must suffer greatly, thanks be to God’s mercy, I will not lack courage.”
“Our earthly and eternal happiness depend on following our vocation without faltering.”
“Actions speak louder than words. Let your words teach and your actions speak.”
“All blessings come to us through our Lord. He will teach us, for in beholding his life we find that he is the best example.”
“Whatever troubles may be before you, accept them cheerfully, remembering whom you are trying to follow. Do not be afraid.”
“As I hope in thee, O Lord, inspire me with that confidence, which brings me to thy holy mountain.”
“Do not abandon yourselves to despair. We are the Easter people and hallelujah is our song.”
“My joy is in leading a hidden life unknown to others.”
“This morning my soul is greater than the world since it possesses you, you whom heaven and earth do not contain.”
“He loves, he hopes, he waits. Our Lord prefers to wait Himself for the sinner for years rather than keep us waiting an instant.”
“I pray God may preserve your health and life many years.”
“How could I bear a crown of gold when the Lord bears a crown of thorns? And bears it for me!”

Source: María Natividad Venegas de la Torre
Sentence: “Charity enters heaven when humility opens the door.”

“The most deadly poison of our times is indifference. And this happens, although the praise of God should know no limits. Let us strive, therefore, to praise him to the greatest extent of our powers.”
I will cover you with My feathers and protect you with My wings.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count, it's the life in your years.

Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Experience is the teacher of all things.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on.
It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
We do not remember days, we remember moments.
The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
The best way out is always through.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
Don't count the days, make the days count.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
It’s not what you look at that matters, it’s what you see.
A ship in harbor is safe, but that’s not what ships are built for.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Everything you can imagine is real.
Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
Dream as if you'll live forever, live as if you'll die today.
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Not everything that can be counted counts, and not everything that counts can be counted.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
We must be willing to let go of the life we planned to have the life that is waiting for us.
Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.

To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
The mind is everything. What you think, you become.

Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.

The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
It’s not the years in your life that count, it’s the life in your years.
Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.

It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

Out of difficulties grow miracles.

What lies behind us and what lies before us are small matters compared to what lies within us.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

Scars remind us where we’ve been. They don’t have to dictate where we’re going.

Adversity introduces a man to himself.
We may encounter many defeats, but we must not be defeated.

Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
Fall down seven times, stand up eight.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can’t practice any other virtue consistently.
I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
Courage is being scared to death, but saddling up anyway.
The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.

Strength shows not only in the ability to persist, but in the ability to start over.
True courage is not the absence of fear but the willingness to proceed in spite of it.

Courage is knowing what not to fear.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is brave five minutes longer.
Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use.
Don’t be discouraged. It’s often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.

Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.

If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
The more you practice the art of thankfulness, the more you have to be thankful for.
Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.

Gratitude bestows reverence, allowing us to encounter everyday epiphanies.
A grateful heart is a magnet for miracles.
The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
The happiest people don't have the best of everything, they just make the best of everything.
Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
No duty is more urgent than giving thanks.
Happiness is itself a kind of gratitude.
When you love what you have, you have everything you need.
Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
There is always something to be thankful for.
Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
Gratitude is a powerful catalyst for happiness.
If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.
Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life.
The more you are in a state of gratitude, the more you will attract things to be grateful for.
Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
Gratitude is the open door to abundance.

Be thankful for what you have; you’ll end up having more.
Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
Gratitude is the wine for the soul. Go on. Get drunk.
Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.

Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.

Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions.
Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events, and outcomes.
Gratitude changes everything.
Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

Let us be kinder to one another.

You make me laugh even when I don’t want to smile.
You always know how to make me feel better when I’m down.
You love me unconditionally, flaws and all.
You believe in me when I don’t believe in myself.
You are my safe place in a world of chaos.
You listen, even when I’m not making sense.
You accept me for who I am and encourage me to grow.
You’re thoughtful in ways that constantly surprise me.
You make the simplest moments feel special.
You challenge me to be a better version of myself.
You make me feel loved, appreciated, and valued every day.
You’re my greatest supporter and biggest fan.
You inspire me to see the world differently.
You care about the little things that matter to me.
You bring so much joy and light into my life.
You are always honest with me, even when it’s hard.
You have a heart that’s pure, kind, and generous.
You make me feel like the most important person in the world.
You see the beauty in everything, including us.
You love me in ways I never thought possible.

The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

We are most alive when we're in love.

True love stories never have endings.
